oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand gesture modelling and recognition involving changing shapes and trajectories, using a Predictive EigenTracker
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATWARDHAN, KS
ROY, SD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tracking
system
dynamic hand gestures
predictive eigentracker
eigenspace
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a novel eigenspace-based framework to model a dynamic hand gesture that incorporates both hand shape as well as trajectory information. We address the problem of choosing a gesture set that models an upper bound on gesture recognition efficiency. We show encouraging experimental results on a such a representative set.
